headline: Nucor Balances Growth Projects And Decarbonization With Earnings And Buybacks
summary: Nucor (NYSE:NUE) is moving ahead with growth and decarbonization plans, including completing major projects and advancing low carbon steel initiatives. The company has a new mill project in West Virginia and is pursuing net zero carbon steel offerings alongside a new fusion energy partnership. These steps come as Nucor reports solid demand, strong segment backlogs, and support from federal policies for domestic steel producers. Nucor is a large US based steel producer with operations across...
